columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: INTERVENTION_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of intervention findings that are associated with the current finding.

columns.name: INTERVENTION_BRANCH
columns.description: Stores the branch of the lesion that the intervention is on.
